flash.email_verified: Email verified successfully! Welcome to TransferCompany
flash.error_no_permission: You don't have the right permissions for that action
flash.error_not_found: We could not find what you were looking for
flash.order_amount_higher_than_credit_ba: The company does not have enough credits to complete the order, please add more credits
flash.order_lower_than_zero: The total price is lower than 0 and cannot be completed
flash.quotation_lower_than_zero: The total price is lower than 0 and cannot be send
flash.reupload_image: There are some problems with the uploaded files
flash.transfer_custom_pricing_missing: Please upload the price table for the custom size
has_declared_coc: I declare to be a corporate company registered at the Chamber of Commerce
has_vat_number: Do you have a VAT number?
mail.account_verify_line_1: Please click the button below to verify your email address.
mail.client_account_created_line_1: Thank you for registering with TransferCompany. You're almost ready to order the most beautiful textile transfers! Just verify your email address now by clicking the button below:
mail.client_account_created_line_2: We offer a wide range of textile transfers, so we would like to send you a sample package of all our products, allowing you to try them out yourself. We also recommend conducting a wash test to ensure that your heat press works perfectly with our transfers.
mail.client_account_created_line_3: Do you want to take advantage of the best prices and the fastest delivery times right away? Learn more about our subscription plans.
mail.client_account_created_line_4: Are you ready to place an order right away? Request your first quotation via this link.
mail.client_account_created_line_5: If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us via the telephone number or email address provided below.
mail.general_link_disclaimer: If you're having trouble clicking the ":actionText" button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser:
mail.order_in_process_line_1: Good news! Your order (#:number) has been approved. We will process your order as soon as possible.
mail.order_in_process_line_2: Tip: Before applying the transfers, we always advise conducting a test on the intended material first. On our website, you'll find comprehensive information on how to apply the textile transfers in a professional manner.
mail.order_in_process_line_3: Although we conduct strict quality controls during our production, we have no control over the clothing onto which you apply the transfers. From experience, we've noticed that the quality of the clothing can vary. Be prepared for this and conduct a test prior to pressing and washing. This way, you'll also deliver a high-quality product.
mail.order_in_process_line_4: Do you have any questions or doubts? Don't hesitate to contact us. We're happy to assist you further!
mail.order_pick_up_line_1: We have prepared your order, and it's now ready for pickup at:
mail.order_pick_up_line_3: Monday through Friday, from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM
mail.order_shipped_line_1: We want to inform you that your order will be shipped today.
mail.order_shipped_line_2: If you have any questions about this shipment, please don't hesitate to contact us. We're here to assist you further!
mail.quotation_created_line_1: You have successfully created a quotation at TransferCompany
mail.quotation_created_line_2: You can view the quotation and put it into production via the link below:
mail.quotation_created_line_3: If you have any questions or would like to request samples, please don't hesitate to reach out to us!
mail.quotation_received_line_1: We have prepared a new quotation for you!
mail.quotation_received_line_2: You can view the quotation and put it into production via the link below:
mail.quotation_received_line_3: Hoping to have provided you with a suitable offer. If anything is unclear or if you would like to receive samples, please let us know!
mail.supplier_order_placed_line_1: Hereby, we are sending you a new order (#:number). Attached, you will find the specifications of the order. Could you please send us an email when this order is shipped?
mail.supplier_order_placed_line_2: If you have any questions about this order, please don't hesitate to contact us.
mail.technical_drawing_rejected_line_1: Unfortunately, your file did not meet the requirements and has been declined for the following reason:
mail.technical_drawing_rejected_line_2: Please revise your file and upload it again with your order. Once uploaded, we will recheck it promptly.
mail.technical_drawing_rejected_line_3: If you're having trouble providing a good file, no worries! Our DTP department is here to help. For €45.00, we'll create a technical drawing that meets the requirements (based on a correctly supplied file).
mail.technical_drawing_rejected_line_4: Send an email to info@transfercompany.nl and include your order number in the subject line, along with the request to have the technical drawing created by TransferCompany.
mail.technical_drawing_updated_line_1: Thank you for your order (#:number)! You can view the details of your order via the following button:
mail.technical_drawing_updated_line_2: We will check and process your order. You will receive another confirmation from us whether your file has been approved or rejected.
mail.technical_drawing_updated_line_3: Do you have any questions? Don't hesitate to contact us. We're happy to assist you further!
moq_disclaimer: This product is available from a quantity of :moq or more
name: Name
password_forgot.body: Enter email to reset your password
processing_time_disclaimer: Starts after the technical drawing has been approved by our team
processing_time_express: Need your order faster? Change your order to express to change the processing time to :days days
quantity_too_high: Contact us directly for a special offer based on the requested quantity!
reference.body: Fill in a reference to find your order easily
rejection_reason_type.does_not_meet_requ: The file does not meet the requirements
rejection_reason_type.incorrect_color: One of the PMS colors is not correct
rejection_reason_type.low_quality: The file is of low quality
rejection_reason_type.waiting_for_techni: Waiting for technical drawing made by TransferCompany
shipping_is_billing: Shipping address is the same as billing
technical_drawing_alternative_upload: Click here to send a file via WeTransfer and paste the link below
terms_accepted: I agree to the general terms & conditions
verification.body: Please verify your account by checking your email. If you haven't received an email, you can resend the verification email using the button below.
with_custom_size: Do you want to order per print?
